Subjects: carols, satirical; evils of the time
_description: An Exhortation to God’s Service — twelve monorhyming quatrains and burden: ‘When all ys don and all ys sayd / God must be known seruyd & obeid’

CamTCC1157.First Lines:
Yougth luste Reches or ManhodTrustyth in any of thes godes
                    forbed…
CamTCC1157.Last Lines:
…ye se but few pore pepull apperematers of a moneth is not
                    sped in a here yereWhen all ys doon
CamTCC1157.Editions:
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 253-4; 1977, 224-5.
